descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.minus.com/ibeAZfQrZDqKj4.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][FONT=Edwardian Script ITC][size=30][B][color=Chocolate][u]Rebecca\'s friends can be found below.[/color][/B][/size][/FONT][/u]
[size=4][color=Chocolate]
Alexandra - [url=http://http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24369]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24369[/url]
BreeLynn - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24139]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24139[/url]
Dometria - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24161]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24161[/url]
Fayleen - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24174]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24174[/url]
Jazmin - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24248]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24248[/url]
Arianna - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24145]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24145[/url]
[/color]
[/center]
[color=Deepskyblue]
REQUIRED MODs: [/color][color=Royalblue]The only Required mod is Apachii Sky Hair - A deep thanks for Apachii\'s work!! - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168[/url]
[/color]
[color=Deepskyblue]MODs NOT REQUIRED:[/color][color=Royalblue]ARMOR: Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004]skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004[/url]
[/color]

[center][u][color=red]People I would like to thank[/center][/u][/color]
[center][color=Royalblue]\"Thank you to all the those modders out there for making this game much more enjoyable.\"[/center]
[/color]
[color=Deepskyblue][center]
SPECIAL THANKS:[/color][color=Royalblue] I learned how to do this from a fellow
modder named BravoOskar. He graciously took the time to put up a tutorial,
so that some of us could try to do something like this. [/color][/center]
[color=Deepskyblue]
QUESTIONS YOU MIGHT ASK:[/color]
[color=firebrick]Q. I downloaded Rebecca and she doesn\'t look like your pictures.[/color]
[color=Deepskyblue]A. I am using several mods that make characters in game look better.[/color]


[color=Deepskyblue][center][u]Suggested Character Texture Mods[/u][/color][color=Royalblue]
1. Better Females by BellaGail - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
2. Covereyes by Mr Lenski - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
3. Coverwomen by Mr Lenski - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
4. Calientes Female Body Mod by Caliente - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
[/center]
[/color]
[/size]
author: Sharky Borror
